1.12.2.1.12.2-2.0.4: - Fixed fruit not generating during worldgen in palm-like trees.
1.12.2.1.12.2-2.0.3:
+ Added config file with options for fruit gen, and tree configuration
- Made Maple Syrup be limited by tree
1.12.2.1.12.2-2.0.1:
+ Added seasonal fruit offsets (each fruit will grow in its own season if serene season is installed)
+ Added update checker
- Minor fixes and patches
1.12.2.1.12.2-2.0.0:
+ Custom 3D fruit blocks for all fruit trees
+ Custom seed textures for all seed items
+ Made Date, Coconut, Papaya, Banana and Dragonfruit be palm-like
+ Dragonfruit behaves more like a cactus, damaging on contact
+ Added Banana tree suckers around banana trees, can be harvested and replanted
+ Added maple spile block for harvesting maple syrup
+ Paperbark trunk can be stripped with an axe to obtain paper
+ Adjusted growth parameters of many trees
+ Added passionfruit vine
+ Some fruit blocks may now fall, causing damage
+ Added seasonal changes to fruits (requires serene seasons)
- Renamed spiderweb tree to Infested Oak
- Updated to latest Dynamic Trees version
- Adjusted recipes for realism
- Many, many, many other fixes and changes
